Compatible with iOS 4 - 10

Hera is a new tweak that will make your status bar more enjoyable. The status bar icons are now shortcuts that can be accessed from any application or even simply from the springboard.

When you want to put in airplane mode you just have to press your operator, to remove it just pressed on the plane.

Want to change wifi? It's simple, you just have to press the logo of the wifi to be able to choose a network.

Do you want to quickly access the clock application? You just press the time and a shortcut of the clock application will open (the application must be opened in the app switcher before).

You can connect to a bluetooth device by pressing the bluetooth icon.

You can activate the power low mode by pressing the battery.

When you press the icons as not disturbing, blocking rotation, location and data, they turn off.

It does not have everything!

You have the possibility to move freely and without respring each icons of the status bar, you just need to hold an icon and move it. Its possession is saved.

A section in the settings is provided to be able to reset the default icons and to acrev√© or deactivated Hera.

Hera is compatible with all versions of iOS (from iOS 4 to iOS 10) and with most tweaks for status bar.
